transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Navneet product se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Mam very good afternoon, main Aasim Khan bol raha tha indiamart.com se business manager. Aapki abhi baat hui thi na aapke jo account manager hai Bhanu ji se?
Customer: Haan woh baat hua tha.
Executive: Haan haan toh main business manager baat kar raha tha jaise ki main dekh raha tha aapne yahan complaint raise kiya hua tha TDS ke refund ke regarding mam.
Executive: Toh uske confirmation uski confirmation ke liye hi maine aapko call kiya hai ki mam aapka na TDS ka yahan par aage jo hamari finance team hai unko aage humne forward kar diya hai aapki TDS ki jo entry aapne hame bheji hui hai, jo certificate aapne bheja hua hai. Baki mam iska jo refund aapko aayega toh woh five to seven days mein aapke account mein aapko mil jayega mam.
Customer: Haan okay.
Executive: Agar jaise aapne jo yahan par jo certificate wagera diya hua hai toh woh aage hum logon ne sara kuch bhej diya apni team ko yani ki iska jo process hota hai. Aur aapko jo iska mil jayega refund woh five to seven days mein aapke paas mil jayega. Toh agar aapko koi iske alawa koi aur koi question ya kuch puchna ho ek senior hone ke naate maine isliye bas aapko call kiya tha.
Customer: Sir lekin woh ho jaye toh aap mere ko screen screenshot aap bhej dena.
Executive: Haan haan. Woh mam nahi mam dekho aapne jab government ko pay kara toh woh mam hamare paas rakhne ka koi rights hote hi nahi hai. Aapne hame form 16A de diya, TDS ka certificate aapne form 16A hame de diya. Ab mam hum yani ki jo aapka amount hai woh aapko provide karwa denge refund aapke account mein ho jayega mam woh within isliye maine aapko bataya ki aap pareshan mat hoiyega kahin yeh na ho ki aapko lage pata nahi denge ya na denge toh uska jo process hone mein five to seven days ka time lagta hai yeh batane ki koshish main aapko kar raha hun.
Customer: Haan okay chalega.
Executive: Haan aisa nahi hai ki woh aapko refund nahi milega aapka ₹1700 hai na mam ₹1700.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan toh woh ₹1700 aapko definitely milenge milenge woh hum log nahi rakhte hain bas thoda sa time lagega isiliye bas maine aapko information dene ke liye bataya ki thoda sa aap patience rakhiyega aur pareshan mat hoiyega woh 100% aapke account mein aayega hi aayega mam.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai baki koi issue hota hai toh aap bata sakte ho.
Customer: Nahi abhi toh dusra kuch issue nahi hai.
Executive: Nahi services wagera jo IndiaMART aapko provide karwa raha hai usme agar aap koi problem face kar rahe ho toh aap bata sakte hain. Service aap hi dekhti hain ya koi aur dekhti hain mam?
Customer: Nahi woh hamare sir hi dekhte hain.
Executive: Aapke sir dekhte hain aap mam wahan kya finance wagera accounts wagera dekhti hain mam?
Customer: Haan accounts dekhte hain.
Executive: Achcha toh theek hai koi baat nahi TDS se related jo aapki query thi woh maine aapko bata diya aapke paas aa jayega five to seven days mein.
Customer: Okay. Thank you sir.
Executive: Theek hai. Welcome.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer requested a screenshot of refund confirmation.

Resolution:

- Executive confirmed TDS refund was forwarded to finance team.

- Executive assured refund in 5-7 days.

- Executive clarified screenshot cannot be provided.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- tds, refund, form 16a, account
